 2007-12152007-08-01HRSD,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisRegulations Amending the ONTARIO HYDRO NUCLEAR FACILITIES EXCLUSION FROM PART II OF THE CANADA LABOUR CODE REGULATIONS (OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY) by placing limitations on a worker's right to refuse dangerous work when assigned to an on-site nuclear response force where the danger is inherent in or is a normal condition of employment, or when refusal would directly endanger the life, health or safety of another person.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0186 Publication Date: 2007-08-22
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the ONTARIO HYDRO NUCLEAR FACILITIES EXCLUSION FROM PART II OF THE CANADA LABOUR CODE REGULATIONS (OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY) by placing limitations on a worker's right to refuse dangerous work when assigned to an on-site nuclear response force where the danger is inherent in or is a normal condition of employment, or when refusal would directly endanger the life, health or safety of another person.
